thread.section_title: Loopmasters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Loopmasters | www.loopmasters.com
thread.title: bluesfade

author: bluesfade
title: bluesfade
text: Loopmasters.com has a wide variety of loops, clips, and videos for help you to create. I write stories and I need music to write by. I found that creating my own music for a specific scene, whether it takes place in India, or a scene from the 1930's, I have no problem finding what I need, and the clip properties are excellent. I'm using ProTools 12.7 right now, and the loops are easily manipulated within the tracks.
